name: "I gunna make a game" *smacks lips
description:
We made this in a 1.5 weeks and we had no clue what we were doing. Description"" lol uwu yolo Minecraft4Life Theres water, and a fire Person, um idunno there's trees and maybe a couple of flowers... just pls play the game, please, my mom said if I made a game she'd renew my roblox account :(. plllllssss. He was a sk8ter boi she said "see u l8ter boi". Definitely should have sound btw. 

- Sent from my iPhone.
